tweet_text: As a vaccine checker at a venue, a couple approached me and asked "vaccine for what." I couldn't believe it. How can you not know what the vaccine is for?

The person receiving a vaccine requested to use their own bandaid, but the nurse allowed it. However, upon seeing the bandaid, the nurse realized it was decorated with images of Donald Trump, making for an awkward situation.

In 1955, people eagerly lined up to receive the polio vaccine despite the absence of artificial satellites. Today, in 2021, we carry powerful devices in our pockets and have sent robots to Mars. Despite this progress, some people believe conspiracy theories about the COVID vaccine containing harmful substances.
When asked about side effects after receiving her second vaccine shot, my mom responded that she had developed a newfound appreciation for science.

A young ballet student asked if the speaker was excited about getting the COVID vaccine, affectionately calling it the "Fauci Ouchie." The speaker found this so adorable that they will now use that term instead of the vaccine's official name.
A nurse expresses dismay that Senator Lindsey Graham received a vaccine before she did, despite working on the front line of the pandemic.
Johnson & Johnson applied their expertise in creating 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner to develop their COVID-19 vaccine.

As her 10-year-old child received the Pfizer vaccine, he was scared but kept whispering his high-risk best friend's name. Despite the fear, the parent has no regrets as the child did something out of love for another person.
Dolly Parton helped fund research for the COVID vaccine. It's important to remember this when deciding whether or not to take the vaccine.
Oh no, the pharmacy is out of everything except COVID vaccines and I need something for my horse's worm infestation.

Last night, my aunt, who was a lawyer that was about to retire, passed away from COVID-19. She had received all the available vaccines, but was not ill for very long. She was a strong advocate for saving women from domestic violence and volunteered for the House of Ruth. Her passing is a great loss and she will be missed. RIP.

Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi discussed India's efforts to fight COVID-19 with philanthropist Bill Gates. The two also talked about the work of the Gates Foundation in battling the pandemic, the role of technology and innovation, and developing a vaccine to cure the coronavirus.

A leaked document has revealed details of Pfizer's manufacturing and supply agreement for their COVID-19 vaccine. The company had been attempting to keep the details of their international agreements confidential. The leaked document provides insight into the terms of the agreement.

Explaining the science behind mRNA vaccines (such as Pfizer and Moderna) can be difficult, but they are highly effective. The author attempted to simplify the process in a Twitter thread while waiting for a patient.

There are myths about COVID-19 that need to be clarified, including the belief that the virus will disappear in the summer. This is not true as past pandemics did not follow weather patterns and the virus is global, meaning that while it may be summer in some parts of the world, it will be winter in others.

BTS spoke at the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) about climate action, COVID-19 vaccination, and caring for ourselves and our communities. Their message has inspired the youth to strive towards making the world a better place. #BTSLoveMyself
The FDA has approved the first COVID-19 vaccine for individuals aged 16 and above to prevent the disease.
A thrift store worker discovered a vaccine card from 1956, which seems relevant due to the current COVID-19 vaccination push.
The ER is overwhelmed with COVID-19 cases due to the highly transmissible Delta Variant. Almost all ICU admissions were unvaccinated, with many wishing they had received the vaccine.

Today, I received the COVID-19 vaccine and although my wing feels a bit sore, it will help protect me and those around me. It turns out that I have been receiving vaccines since I was a young bird, as mentioned by Ms. Erica Hill.

Oxford University planned to open source its vaccine, but the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation convinced them to sell exclusive rights to AstraZeneca. However, AstraZeneca is struggling to deliver and many poor countries are finding it difficult to access the vaccine.

A 66-year-old immigrant researcher worked for four decades on mRNA, despite rarely receiving grants, never having her own lab, and earning less than $60K. Her work is the foundation for the Pfizer and Moderna COVID-19 vaccines.

Jin of BTS says they are all vaccinated and understand people who fear vaccines because it's new. However, he believes that being afraid of the past won't allow for progress. A photo of President Moon's smile is also included.
For years, KFC had a secret blend of 11 herbs and spices that nobody questioned. However, in the current scenario, people are suddenly curious about the ingredients in the Covid vaccine.
According to a video shared on Twitter, the claim that the COVID-19 vaccine stops transmission is being denied by those who originally made the statement.

Some Covid patients in Alabama are begging for the vaccine before being intubated, according to a local doctor. She said she had to tell them it's too late while holding their hand. It highlights the importance of getting vaccinated before getting sick.

The USA, UK and European Union have blocked Global South countries from manufacturing and importing affordable versions of COVID-19 vaccines, despite their fight for the right to do so. This move has been met with criticism, as it prevents the distribution of vaccines to those who need it most.

According to the CDC, 94% of those who died from coronavirus had other health issues. Less than 10,000 Americans have died from the virus alone. The author of the article believes that the virus is a hoax and that Democrats used it to rig the election.

India has achieved a record-breaking number of vaccinations, providing hope in the fight against COVID-19. The vaccine remains the strongest weapon in the battle against the disease, and congratulations are due to those who have received the vaccine, as well as frontline workers who have helped to administer it. Well done to India for this achievement.

The notion that the COVID-19 vaccines were developed suddenly is incorrect and has led to tragic consequences. The discovery and development of these vaccines were the result of many years of basic research across multiple fields, which built upon a vast repository of human knowledge. Science operates in this way, and it is remarkable.

The World Health Organization (WHO) has given approval to the first-ever malaria vaccine, a breakthrough in the fight against the deadly disease. Tens of thousands of children in sub-Saharan Africa could be saved as a result. The development of the vaccine has been ongoing for 100 years and has been described by a WHO official as a “historic event”.

The governor of Texas, Greg Abbott, is being criticized for his handling of the COVID-19 pandemic, vaccine distribution, and his prioritization of energy company profits over the safety of Texans. He is being accused of causing the unnecessary deaths of people in the state.
Saying vaccines are unnatural is like saying eye glasses, air travel, and many other things are unnatural.
A new investigation has received evidence from a whistleblower who was part of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine trial. The evidence presented raises concerns about regulatory oversight and data integrity.
Indian-made vaccines have received emergency use approval, showcasing the country's science community's commitment to achieving the dream of an Aatmanirbhar Bharat, rooted in care and compassion.

An mRNA vaccine does not contain the virus, but sends an email to the immune system to show what the virus looks like and how to eliminate it, before disappearing like a Snapchat message. This is a remarkable technology.

Chloe Mrozak, a 24-year-old from Illinois, was arrested in Hawaii for allegedly using a fake COVID-19 vaccine card with the misspelled term "Maderna" instead of "Moderna" to enter the state and bypass travel restrictions.

A court has rejected the FDA's request to produce 500 pages of data per month for the Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine, ordering instead that 55,000 pages per month must be produced. The judge's three-page decision can be read at the link provided.

A study indicates that Pfizer and Moderna's vaccine effectiveness against the Omicron variant is negative after three months of receiving the shot, making vaccinated individuals 76.5% and 39.3% more likely to contract the virus than unvaccinated individuals.

Today marks the 9-month anniversary of when the author collapsed at home, just 2 weeks after getting the AstraZeneca vaccine. Despite being a fit and healthy person, they lost their left leg above the knee and experienced other complications attributed to the vaccine.

The purpose of the booster shot was not to reduce symptoms, but rather to maintain the belief that the vaccine could prevent both contracting and spreading COVID-19, which was the basis for vaccine mandates. This belief was shattered this month.

I received my first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine today and feel very fortunate to be living in a region where it is available. However, it's important to acknowledge the unequal distribution of vaccines worldwide.

The Covid Passport goes beyond mere vaccination verification and creates a social hierarchy and surveillance system unlike anything seen before. People should research it and understand the full implications. This is a critical time to resist its implementation.

A new study has revealed that both vaccines and naturally acquired immunity are effective in neutralizing COVID-19 variants, contradicting Dr. Fauci and other "fearmongers". The news is a positive development for everyone except bureaucrats and petty tyrants. The study looked at neutralizing antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 variants.

The Blackfeet Nation in Montana gave away 750 extra doses of COVID-19 vaccine to neighboring residents in Alberta, Canada. People traveled long distances and lined up for miles on the highway to receive vaccines at a mobile clinic established at the border crossing.

A person is telling journalists who criticized natural immunity to read the science and linking to an article that states a Harvard epidemiologist claims the case for COVID vaccine passports has been destroyed.
UPS and FedEx trucks have departed from Pfizer's facility near Kalamazoo, Michigan carrying the first shipment of COVID-19 vaccine in the United States.
Dr. Malone, inventor of mRNA vaccine technology, has the right to state his scientific opinion on Covid vaccines. Suspending him is a disgrace, regardless of whether he is right or wrong.
Instead of using the term "vaccine passports," it is suggested to use "immunization records," which have always been required for jobs and school.
The FDA and CDC have advised a temporary halt of the Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine as a precautionary measure.

Jonathan Isaac of the Orlando Magic basketball team has stated that he will not be getting vaccinated against Covid-19 because he believes he has natural immunity, and because he feels that the data shows he is not at risk of contracting the virus.

Sportscaster Stephen A. Smith contracted COVID-19 and suffered severe symptoms that led to hospitalization. As a survivor, he believes this is proof that the vaccine he received worked. However, the statement that he only "almost" died has been criticized by some as insensitive and downplaying the severity of the illness.
Former Seattle firefighters and police officers who lost their jobs for not getting vaccinated against COVID-19 are currently volunteering to feed homeless people in the city.

A study conducted by the Cleveland Clinic on 52,238 employees has found that unvaccinated individuals who have previously had COVID-19 are at no higher risk of reinfection than those who have had the virus and received the vaccine.

Jimin from BTS, the popular K-Pop band, has donated KRW100 million to Rotary to help more children get access to polio vaccines. This collaboration with WHO and other partners aims to end polio. Jimin's act of generosity matches his talent for music.

Despite record job growth, a drop in unemployment, a high stock market and the distribution of 220 million vaccines, only 30% of Americans believe the US is on the right track. This highlights a messaging issue for the Democratic Party.

I talked to @POTUS about the significance of young people getting vaccinated. Visit https://t.co/r4TnB8gx3b to know more about vaccines and locate a vaccination center near you. It's free, simple, and crucial! https://t.co/rnM2UtRfeb

The Biden administration has confirmed that 20 million doses of Covid-19 vaccine are missing. Earlier, suspicions were raised about the federal vaccine supply being lower than expected, and it was suggested to look for answers from Jared. This suggestion is repeated now.
Norway has resumed normal life without mask mandates or social distancing. There are no vaccine mandates either. Following scientific advice has enabled the country to enjoy freedom in these aspects.
Do not rely on Joe Rogan's opinions as he is not a certified scientist. On a different note, the Jonas Brothers and Big Bird urge people to get vaccinated.

Stanley Johnson, who repeatedly broke lockdown rules, has received a second vaccine dose before many vulnerable individuals have received their first. This highlights the hypocrisy, cronyism, and elitism of the current Conservative government.

A Utah teacher has been fired for telling conservative students that Trump is a moron, and advising them to take the vaccine and stop watching FOX News. Supporters are rallying for her to get her job back.

A discussion about why people who have received COVID-19 vaccines are still getting infected with the virus. The vaccines were created to provide protection against the original strain of the virus, but a mutated strain called delta has become dominant by the time vaccination campaigns were rolled out.

The vaccine aims to reduce the severity of your symptoms and the number of hospitalizations, which helps prevent overcrowding and reduces the burden on healthcare workers. It also lowers the risk of death. Please spread the word.

Wisconsin Republican lawmaker Andre Jacque, who sponsored bills against mask and vaccine mandates, is currently on a ventilator and fighting for his life in Intensive Care after contracting COVID-19. Jacque had attended a heated committee meeting without a mask just days before falling ill. If you have been vaccinated, please retweet.

The article claims that Joe Biden did not mention anything about naturally acquired immunity, which recent studies suggest is more long-lasting than the vaccine. Around 100 million Americans are thought to have this immunity, but there was no scientific reason for the omission. The article suggests that this is dishonest and shows that the authorities do not care about this issue.

A new variant of COVID-19 called C.1.2 has been discovered in South Africa and in other countries, with concerns that it may be more infectious and able to evade vaccines. The mutation rate of C.1.2 is nearly twice as fast as that of other variants.

Kevin Durant has tested positive for COVID-19, leaving the Brooklyn Nets with only Kyrie Irving as their eligible player. Irving had previously been criticized by the media for refusing to get vaccinated.

A Twitter user is seeking help with their mother's medical bills and adjustments to make her comfortable. The mother had a bad reaction to both Covid-19 and the vaccine, resulting in amputation below the knees and the likelihood of losing most of her hands in the future. The family is grateful for their mother's life and any assistance that can be provided.

American and Southwest Airlines will go against Republican Governor Greg Abbott's ban on vaccine mandates and will continue to enforce them in compliance with the Biden administration's orders. Show your support by retweeting.

Some misinformation regarding COVID-19 has been repeated by US Supreme Court justices today. Justice Sotomayor claimed 100,000 children are on ventilators in critical condition, while Justice Breyer suggests a vaccine mandate would eliminate every case in the US. Sotomayor also claimed that COVID deaths are currently at their highest point.

The number of Covid deaths in the US over the last two years surpasses those caused by AIDS from 1981-2000. Despite the vaccine, the country has not taken enough measures to prevent the spread. The lack of action will be viewed by future generations with disbelief, considering the vast loss of life.

The University of Connecticut announced that students who do not get vaccinated will face fines and internet access blocks. There are concerns about the safety of the vaccine, but the author of the post refuses to get vaccinated.

The COVID-19 pandemic won't end on January 1, 2021, just because it's a new year. The pandemic can only be slowed and ultimately ended by our actions such as getting vaccinated, wearing masks, and avoiding crowds. Time alone won't solve the problem.

Scientists at the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research have created a COVID-19 vaccine that offers protection against all virus variants, including the latest Omicron variant. The vaccine is called the 'Spike Ferritin Nanoparticle COVID-19 vaccine', or SpFN.

A federal judge has ruled in favor of a Kentucky hospital system's COVID vaccine mandate, rejecting a legal request from anti-vaxxer hospital employees to end the mandate. The employees who refuse to get vaccinated will now be fired, as their actions put patients and colleagues at risk. The judge's decision has been praised and shared on social media.
Don't be picky about COVID-19 vaccines. No vaccine is perfect, it is important to receive whichever vaccine is available to you to protect yourself and others.

A fake diagram of a 5G chip supposedly included in the COVID-19 vaccine has been debunked in Italy. The diagram was actually an electric circuit for a guitar pedal, and its inclusion in the vaccine was deemed to be a humorous suggestion.
Some restaurants and bars in Calgary are now mandating vaccine passports to sit on patios, causing patrons to bring their own food and have picnics on the street instead.
Scientists have successfully reversed memory loss in mice with trials for an Alzheimer's vaccine, and are ready to progress to human trials.
Vaccines were responsible for eradicating polio and smallpox, not herd immunity.

The writer's 5-year-old daughter, who has a weakened immune system due to cancer and transplant treatments, did not develop antibodies after receiving vaccines. This highlights the importance of vaccinating and taking precautions like wearing masks during the pandemic to protect vulnerable populations.

A physician and director of the Medical Ethics Program at UC Irvine has been placed on leave by the University of California for challenging their vaccine mandate in court. The individual provides further details on their situation in a post.

After being against vaccines, my brother passed away from COVID on August 31st, and his wife passed away yesterday from the same disease. Please get vaccinated and wear masks to prevent further tragedies.

In just a few weeks, Texas schools have recorded more than 50,000 confirmed coronavirus cases in students. Over a dozen school districts have temporarily closed due to the disease, and Texas has had 59 child COVID-19 deaths as of September 3, making it a leader in this statistic.

The tweet accuses Emmanuel Macron, Justin Trudeau, and Joe Biden of being "evil, totalitarian leaders" who are using fear to force vaccinations and vaccine passports. It expresses support for the citizens of France who are resisting this supposed tyranny and encourages them to continue fighting for their freedom.

A police chief in North Carolina has been put on two weeks of unpaid leave and six months of probation after advising officers to visit a fraudulent vaccination clinic to obtain fake vaccination cards. Public opinion is in favor of the chief being fired.

Despite claims from fact-checkers and the government, there is currently no FDA-approved COVID-19 vaccine in the United States, and Pfizer has no immediate plans to make one available, according to a recent investigation.

The Moderna vaccine, which has been authorized for emergency use in the US, was developed in partnership with President Trump and the National Institutes of Health (NIH) on January 13, 2020. This is positive news for the US and the world.

Piers Corbyn, an anti-vaxxer, was tricked into accepting £10,000, which he believed came from AstraZeneca, to stop criticising their vaccine. However, the money was actually monopoly money and the conversation was recorded.

The Biden administration is using punitive measures to force Marines to get the COVID-19 vaccine, including withholding tuition assistance and pensions. This move has been criticized as medical tyranny.

Taking the COVID vaccine can have positive results and enable socializing with friends. It is incorrect to say that there are no side effects as everyone has different reactions to vaccines. The author took the vaccine and experienced no negative effects.

AT&T has become the largest private company in the US to require its workers to be vaccinated against COVID-19, and it has warned that all employees who do not meet its deadline could be fired. If you support AT&T's decision to safeguard the lives of its staff and customers, please retweet.

Good news! BioNTech, the maker of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine, has developed a potential mRNA vaccine for multiple sclerosis. The vaccine has shown great promise in a study with mice, demonstrating the ability to improve symptoms and halt the progression of MS.

United Airlines will terminate 600 employees who refuse to comply with its vaccine mandate, with the option of getting vaccinated. Show your support for United's decision to keep our skies safe by retweeting.
Social movements gathered in São Paulo's Paulista Avenue demanding vaccines, food, and the immediate impeachment of Brazil's Jair Bolsonaro.

Lisa Shaw, a BBC presenter, died due to complications from the AstraZeneca Covid vaccine, according to a coroner's report. She developed headaches a week after her first dose and suffered blood clots in the brain, causing her death. She was a healthy mother of one.

The US Health Department informed governors that a strategic reserve of COVID-19 vaccines existed, which would be released to increase vaccine supplies. This week it transpired that this reserve did not exist. Politicians have called for an explanation from the Trump administration.

This report seems to be creating confusion. It states that 75% of Americans are vaccinated while COVID cases have risen by 300% compared to last year when there was no vaccine. It is important to note that even with a high vaccination rate, there are still individuals who are unvaccinated and susceptible to the virus. Additionally, the new variants of COVID-19 can still lead to spread and higher cases, even among vaccinated individuals.

Joe Biden's presidency has been marked by several challenges including a gas crisis, border crisis, closed schools, rising inflation, Israel's attacks, and increased crime in major cities. He has also taken credit for President Trump's vaccine efforts and plans to raise taxes.

A man from Israel, where almost the entire eligible population has been vaccinated, showed his vaccine passport on his smartphone when asked. He expressed confusion over why everything is politicized in America. The author agrees with him.

America's Frontline Doctors, a group of medical professionals, have filed a lawsuit in federal court to seek a temporary restraining order against the use of COVID-19 vaccines in children. The group aims to protect civil liberties and bodily integrity.

Polio killed over 3,000 Americans in 1952. But after a vaccine was developed in 1955, every state passed laws mandating polio vaccinations for school entry. By contrast, COVID-19 has claimed the lives of over 345,000 Americans in 2020 with another 416,000 fatalities occurring in 2021.
The FDA has fully approved Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine after confirming its safety and effectiveness. It is now encouraged that everyone gets vaccinated to finally end the pandemic.

A partner at 8VC lost their uncle to COVID-19 in India, where the situation is worsening. They are calling for more vaccines and donations to help with relief efforts. To honor their family, they will donate $50 for every retweet, up to $125,000 USD.

The COVID-19 vaccines were not designed to completely prevent people from getting infected with the virus. While it is still possible to contract COVID-19 after getting vaccinated, the vaccines work to reduce the severity of symptoms and decrease the risk of death. It's important to understand this distinction, as some people seem to have unrealistic expectations of the vaccines.
Antivaxxers in Greece paid 400 euros to doctors to give them bacteriostatic water instead of the COVID-19 vaccine. However, doctors administered the real vaccine and kept the money.
Disney and other Florida-based companies have halted their COVID-19 vaccine mandates and are rehiring people who were fired for refusing to get vaccinated.

The tweet accuses Bill Gates of being involved in various aspects of the pandemic, including the Wuhan lab, the World Economic Forum predictions, vaccines, tests, and censorship. It also claims that Gates is buying a lot of land while people are suffering due to lockdowns. The tweet calls for Gates to be arrested for crimes against humanity.

Most adults have received their COVID vaccine, but working on a COVID ward for four weeks has shown that the majority of hospitalised patients are unvaccinated and now regret delaying getting vaccinated. Young adults are among those who have become very sick. It is important not to delay getting vaccinated.

A Texas judge has ruled in favor of Southwest Airlines' pilot vaccine mandate, setting a precedent that "improves the safety of air travel" and "working conditions for all pilots." This decision is a big loss for Governor Abbott. Share if you support the judge's decision.

Governor Gavin Newsom of California is facing a Republican recall. Californians are encouraged to vote no and return their ballots by September 14th, 8 PM. The ballot includes important issues like vaccines, climate change, immigrant rights, minimum wage, reproductive rights, and gun safety. #VoteNoOnRecall

Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp compared being unvaccinated against COVID-19 to drinking and driving, stating that both endanger the lives of others around you. He encouraged everyone who is eligible to get vaccinated in order to protect themselves and those around them, especially with the current Delta variant surge.
The Pfizer, Moderna, and Oxford vaccines are all effective, protective, and safe.

A firefighter in California has been suspended from duty for rubbing his non-compliance letter with feces from his behind. The incident occurred after he refused to get vaccinated. People are calling for his immediate dismissal from his job.

President Biden criticizes Fox News and other conservative networks for profiting from spreading false information, specifically regarding COVID-19 vaccinations, which he says "kills their own customers."

The CDC stated today that only 28.4% of black people have received the Covid vaccine. As some states require vaccine passports to enter certain venues, such as California and New York, this could disproportionately impact the black community and lead to segregation.

Those over 40 can now receive their COVID-19 booster jab three months after their second vaccine dose. Bookings can be made with the NHS. The person who made the announcement criticized the government for not being present to relay the message.

Hospitals are allowing vaccinated workers with Covid to work with a mask and no fever, while vaccine mandates have resulted in thousands of healthcare workers being fired or quitting. If they had not left, sick workers may not have to continue working.
The Supreme Court has ruled 6-3 to prevent the implementation of Biden's vaccine mandate, which is a significant win for federalism and the country's constitutional rule of law.

Despite claims from the head of the New York police union that 10,000 officers would quit due to the vaccine mandate, only 34 actually resigned. This suggests that the union's statements were likely exaggerated and intended to instill fear rather than reflect reality.
Republican politicians oppose vaccine mandates and refuse to wear masks, but they then attribute the continued spread of Covid-19 to President Biden. This has been reported by the New York Times.

The article highlights the growing concern of brain injury caused by COVID-19 and long COVID. Despite low death rates in young people, hospitalizations and neurological complications are on the rise. Antivaccine advocates are ignoring this issue.

The COVID vaccine mandate imposed by Joe Biden disregards science and violates citizens' right to privacy. The federal government lacks the power to oblige employers to insist on employee vaccinations.

The Chinese QR code vaccine passport system collects extensive personal information including name, photo, age, family members, address, employer, vaccination status, COVID test results, and travel history in real-time. Many believe digital vaccine passports pose greater risks to privacy and security than traditional paper passports.

Supreme Court Justices made a false statement that the Wuhan coronavirus vaccine prevents disease and transmission in the workplace, which is highly alarming as they are using this erroneous information to make decisions.

The COVID vaccine decision is personal and should not affect one's livelihood, says a tweet. The tweet also states that the Biden Vaccine Mandate is unconstitutional and that there is a responsibility to fight back as a state. Additionally, vaccine mandates could harm the economy.

An interview in which former President Donald Trump endorses COVID-19 vaccination is causing surprise among anti-vaccine supporters. In the interview, Trump calls the vaccine "one of the greatest achievements of mankind" and states that those who refuse the vaccine are the ones who end up in hospital.

After receiving the second dose of the Moderna vaccine, I developed a blood clot in my lungs that has affected my breathing and mobility. I am sharing my experience to raise awareness, especially among males aged 18-24, so that others can make informed decisions about getting vaccinated. Please retweet to spread the word ❤️.
Protesters in Verona, Italy are currently chanting their refusal to accept COVID vaccine mandates and their determination to keep fighting against them.

The author, who is 65 years old, is grateful to receive the COVID-19 vaccine and got their first dose this week. They express gratitude towards the scientists, trial participants, regulators, and healthcare workers who have made the availability of the vaccine possible.
New York City has mandated that all police officers and municipal workers who remain unvaccinated will be put on unpaid leave. The decision was made to support vaccine mandates.

Joe Rogan claimed on his show, which has 11 million listeners, that vaccines are causing mutations in COVID-19, and that scientists are afraid to discuss this because they fear being "canceled." This assertion has caused concern among some people.
The vaccine stops severe symptoms and fatalities. Why do some people fail to understand this?

An 86-year-old woman who was in good health was given the COVID-19 vaccine at the insistence of her doctor. Eight weeks later, she developed a cancerous tumor on her cheek. She is 5'2" tall, weighs 95 pounds, does not take prescription medication, and only eats venison, buffalo, fruits, and vegetables. Her blood pressure is 120/80.
At least 75 lawmakers traded stocks related to COVID-19 vaccines, treatments, and tests during the pandemic. This should be illegal.

During the pandemic, more than 75 lawmakers reportedly bought and sold stocks of companies that developed COVID-19 vaccines, treatments, and tests, including Pfizer, Moderna, and J&J. This is according to a report by Business Insider.

Texas Republicans are opposing masks and vaccines, and allowing people to sue Uber drivers for taking women to get abortions after being raped. This is legal, but worrying for those who see it as a violation of rights. The situation is reminiscent of the dystopian society described in Margaret Atwood's novel, The Handmaid's Tale.

Members of the military are being discharged for refusing the COVID-19 vaccine, while unvaccinated illegal immigrants enter the US via the southern border daily without any consequences. The Democratic Party remains silent on the issue.

Fox News anchors who have been vaccinated, such as Tucker Carlson, are criticizing the COVID-19 vaccine and vaccine mandates, while Fox News itself has implemented its own mandates. This hypocrisy is called out in a video by @ReallyAmerican1 host @ChipFranklin, highlighting how Fox News is contributing to the spread of misinformation about the vaccine.

Twelve US states, including Alabama, Arizona, and Georgia, plan to take legal action against the Biden administration over the COVID-19 vaccine mandate. The states are suing to oppose the order, which requires all companies with more than 100 employees to ensure their workforce is vaccinated or tested weekly.

Companies face a penalty of $14,000 for each unvaccinated employee following Biden's vaccine mandate. Meanwhile, undocumented immigrants may be paid up to $450,000 in compensation for crossing the US border illegally, according to recent reports.
This article warns that the vaccine passport is a form of digital ID, which could lead to a social credit score and total state control of behavior, activity, and purchases.

Pope Francis encourages the public to receive COVID-19 vaccines, stating it as an act of love aided by divine grace and scientific advancements. The Pope also appreciates the efforts of scientists and healthcare workers for developing and distributing effective vaccines across the world.

Marcus Lamb, the founder of the Christian Daystar Television Network and an anti-vaxxer, has passed away due to COVID-19. Lamb and his network had criticized vaccines and scientists, attributing them to the devil for two years. In response, the Twitter user who shared the news encouraged people who had been vaccinated to share their support.
Justice Sonia Sotomayor claimed during a court hearing that more than 100,000 children were in serious condition due to COVID-19, many on ventilators, which is false.

Conservative MPs who supported measures to restrict protests and allow removal of citizenship without notice are now opposing the use of vaccine passports, claiming it infringes on freedom and civil liberties.
The 5th Circuit has temporarily halted the OSHA vaccine mandate, stating "grave statutory and constitutional issues" with the mandate.

As the world moves towards vaccination, concerns are being raised about the whereabouts of the $150 million budgeted for purchasing vaccines. Despite much discussion about the vaccine, little is known about the status of these funds.
